content.raw:
@phorak , sorry for taking so long to get back to this. It works well for me.  The fact that the background becomes darker the moment the user changes values at least passes the idea that something is going on.

In the future, we could consider a more dynamic visual feedback, see for example how the text "pulsates" while a log is being recorded:

![recording.gif](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/2208107326-recording.gif)

But this is great as it is now. Approving!
